transcript:
Agent: Hi, is this Mr. Johnson? 
Customer: Yes, it is. Who's calling?
Agent: My name is Alex, and I'm calling from GreenTech Solutions. We specialize in energy-efficient appliances.
Customer: Okay... I think I've heard of you. What can I do for you?
Agent: We've recently launched a new line of smart thermostats that can help reduce your energy bills by up to 30%.
Customer: That sounds interesting. I've been looking to replace my old thermostat.
Agent: Great timing! Our smart thermostat is not only energy-efficient but also learns your schedule and preferences to optimize temperature control.
Customer: How does it learn my schedule?
Agent: It uses AI technology to track your daily routine and adjust the temperature accordingly. You can also control it remotely through our mobile app.
Customer: That's really cool. How much does it cost?
Agent: We're currently offering a promotion for $250, which is a $50 discount from the regular price.
Customer: Okay, that's not bad. Do you offer any installation services?
Agent: Yes, we do. Our installation team will set it up for you, and it's included in the price.
Customer: Alright, I think I'm interested. Can you send me some more information and schedule an installation?
Agent: Absolutely. I'll send you an email with the details, and we can schedule an installation at your convenience.
Customer: Sounds good. Thanks for the info, Alex.
Agent: You're welcome, Mr. Johnson. I'll talk to you soon.
